title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5002.1 - Information furnished by winning ticket holder
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5002.1 - Information furnished by winning ticket holder

State Regulations

Each claimant shall fill out a prize claim form, unless
the prize is less than $600 and is claimed at a licensed lottery sales agent, and surrender such claimant's winning ticket. Nothing in this section shall
prohibit the commission from authorizing a courier service licensed pursuant to

Part 5014 of this Title to provide a claimant with an electronic version of a
prize claim form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

5002.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
